description: JSON Schema definition of the quirks of different CHIP-8 systems.

id.description: An ID for this quirk, by which to reference it in programs.json or platforms.json.

description.description: A description of the quirk and why it exists.

default.description: Whether or not this quirk should be enabled by default.

ifTrue.description: A description of CHIP-8 behavior when this quirk is enabled.

ifFalse.description: A description of CHIP-8 behavior when this quirk is not enabled.
